original_title: Coldplay - Live at iTunes Festival - SXSW
overview: Coldplay invaded an already crowded South by Southwest calendar with new music as headliners of the cityâ€™s inaugural iTunes Festival. The quick 11-song set unfolded at the 2,750-capacity ACL Live at Moody Theatre, small and intimate by Coldplay standards, but was also streamed live to fans around the world.
tagline: Coldplay performing live at SXSW 2014, iTunes festival 2014
title: Coldplay - Live at iTunes Festival - SXSW
